channel.title: Best Grammar contest #1
channel.description:
Heres the para. you gotta write it EXACTLY the way it is.PM me and if its Copy and pasted, I'll know.
[size=20pt][font=Chiller]Hello, this is a story of unexpected terror. You see, young Jimmy, age 14, attenting Catchsight high school, was murdered, a tale of one mans fear and another girls relief.The end was Bobby and George who had killed Jimmy. Using partnership, and phone calls.See, one called Jimmy, and the other attacked, well, for Jimmy, he should have heard this sooner .[/font]

Hello, this is a story of unexpected terror. You see, young Jimmy, age 14, attending Catchsight high school, was murdered, a tale of one man fear and another girls relief. The end was Bobby and George who had killed Jimmy. Using partnership and phone calls. See, one called Jimmy, and the other attacked, well for Jimmy, he should have heard this sooner.

item.title: Best Grammar contest #1
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

Hello, this is a story of unexpected terror. You see, young Jimmy, age 14, attenting Catchsight high school, was murdered, a tale of one mans fear and another girls relief.The end was Bobby and George who had killed Jimmy. Using partnership, and phone calls.See, one called Jimmy, and the other attacked, well, for Jimmy, he should have heard this sooner .

What’s so hard? All you did was spell attending attenting and added a space before the last period and removed spaces after certain periods. This is probably one of those retarded jokes.

Best Grammar?

Read full topic

item.title: Best Grammar contest #1
item.dc:creator: @David David
item.description:
@David wrote:

[quote=“wall of fir, post:1, topic:27487”]Heres the para. you gotta write it EXACTLY the way it is.PM me and if its Copy and pasted, I’ll know.

[size=20pt][font=Chiller]Hello, this is a story of unexpected terror. You see, young Jimmy, age 14, attenting Catchsight high school, was murdered, a tale of one mans fear and another girls relief.The end was Bobby and George who had killed Jimmy. Using partnership, and phone calls.See, one called Jimmy, and the other attacked, well, for Jimmy, he should have heard this sooner .[/font][/quote]

Dude, that sentence isn’t grammatically correct in the first place, so shut up…

Hypocrite…

Read full topic

item.title: Best Grammar contest #1
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

Dat is tru; I am unble to stp myslf.

Are you trying to attract attention as well?

Smegman:

can i take a gander at ur smeg

plse hlp m!

Both of you read the Moparisthebest rules. The rule is that you can’t make spelling mistakes on purpose, and you are.

We don't make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use "you" not "u", we use "why" not "y" etc.

Read full topic
